code_value: Questions 1~2  One of your friends asks you to go to a concert with him. Ask him two questions about the concert. </br>Questions 3~4  You have moved to a new residential area recently, and you are not familiar with the neighborhood. Ask your next-door neighbor two questions about your new neighborhood.
Questions 1~2  One of your friends asks you to go to a concert with him. Ask him two questions about the concert.
Questions 3~4  You have moved to a new residential area recently, and you are not familiar with the neighborhood. Ask your next-door neighbor two questions about your new neighborhood.
